user.title: Set up London Underground

deprecated_yaml_import_issue.description:
Configuring London Underground using YAML sensor platform is deprecated.

While importing your configuration, an error occurred when trying to connect to the Transport for London API. Please restart Home Assistant to try again, or remove the existing YAML configuration and set the integration up via the UI.
deprecated_yaml_import_issue.title: London Underground YAML configuration deprecated
